text: Megan Christine Barry (n√©e Mueller; born September 22, 1963) is an American businesswoman and politician. Barry was the seventh mayor of the city government of Nashville and Davidson County, its first female mayor. She was mayor from 2015 until March 6, 2018. In 2018, Barry resigned after pleading guilty to felony theft related to an affair with a city employee who had was the head of her security detail. Barry is a member of the Democratic Party. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Nashville, Tennessee Category:Politicians from California Category:Businesspeople from California Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Megan Barry
